boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;You don't have to be faster than the shark, just faster than your friends!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Get Bit! is a card game where players are competing to stay alive as the others are being eaten by the shark._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The order of the swimmers is determined by simultaneously playing cards face-down then revealing the values. The number on each player's card determines position in line (higher numbers in front, lower numbers in back), however ties don't move. The swimmer at the back loses a limb to the shark and is flung to the front of the line! The process is repeated until only two swimmers remain on the table. When this happens, the swimmer at the front of the line wins the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Brand new, still sealed, box in excellent condition. Got to get rid of some games for monetary purposes. My loss, your gain! Shipping is $3! Buy now, ships within 2 days with tracking. Combine shipping with any other item I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling and I will discount 5% off the total purchase price as well! Items for sale include: Cave Troll, Clue the Card Game Mystery at Sea, Get Bit, Identik Red and Blue Expansions, Monopoly Deal Card Game, Puerto Rico, and Race for the Galaxy
Reserved for AndySzy

Mayday Games (MYY4295) Game by Dave Chalker, with a great concept and wonderful art done by Gavin Schmitt. Get Bit! is a card game where players are competing to stay alive as the others are being eaten by the shark. The order of the swimmers is determined by simultaneously playing cards face-down then revealing the values. The number on each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s card determines position in line (higher numbers in front, lower numbers in back), however ties don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t move. The swimmer at the back loses a limb to the shark and is flung to the front of the line! The process is repeated until only two swimmers remain on the table. When this happens, the swimmer at the front of the line wins the game!
New and shrinkwrapped Shipping is £2.25 within the UK £4 to the rest of the European Union

Game comes with the Pink robot and Shark-spansion. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve also included 6 wooden chicken leg tokens for the sharkspansion (a bit more thematic than the 6 red cubes originally included, tho I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve left those in too) Finally the clear face stickers for the robots are also included. Game only played once and is in great condition. Postage/ shipping costs available on request. Thanks for looking!
Small wear on one robot still plays fine.
Ask me for shipping cost before trade, if you have any questions let me know.
